abstract.t: This document defines two textual conventions similar to theRowPointer textual convention defined in RFC2579. These two textualconventions indicate how the conceptual row to which an object pointsis to be handled when the object is cloned to create an instance-specific configuration. This cloning may involve the scripting-basedtechniques defined under the SMNP Configuration umbrella, but it neednot: cloning can also be realized with ordinary SNMP Get and Setoperations.
